application_type_full: Householder planning & demolition in a conservation area
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990.

| The development hereby approved shall be retained in accordance with drawing title number(s): LW202100139 01 (Ground and First Floor Plans); LW202100139 02 (Loft and Roof Plans); LW202100139 03 (Proposed Loft Plans); LW202100139 04 (Elevations); LW202100139 05 (Side Elevation); LW202100139 06 (Section A-A'); 100054135; LW202100139 BP01 (Block Plan); Design and Access Statement (6 St Andrews Road).
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.

| The materials to be used for the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing, unless otherwise stated on either the submitted application form or the drawings / plans as listed in Condition (2).

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with Policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021), Policies 7.4, 7.6 and 7B of Adopted Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013), Policies 1.1 (k) and 1.2 (f) of the adopted Development (Core) Strategy (2012).

| The hereby approved two (2) rooflights to the roof slope of the hereby approved development shall not project more than 150mm from the plane of the roof slope when measured perpendicularly and shall be retained as such for the lifetime of the development.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, and to safeguard the character and appearance of the  area in accordance with policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and policies 7B and 7.4 of the Ealing Development Management DPD
description: Rear roof extension, and installation of two roof lights to front roof slope
